mean_cn: n. 旁观者，观众，目击者
mean_en: a person who watches an event, show, game, activity, etc., often as part of an audience
word_etyma: spect看 + ator名词后缀：人 → 看的人 → spectator 观众
short_phrase: Many spectators watch the football game.
sentence: There were tens of thousands of spectators in the football stadium.
sentence_trans: 足球场中聚集了成千上万的观众。
